name: Gulch Guardians
description:
The turtles have been caught off guard and their shells are nowhere to be found. No matter, pots and pans will do the trick. Defend your forest home against the nameless invading army! There's gulches in forests, right?

Roguelike autobattler prototype: single-player super auto pets.

The source code is available on github.

Acknowledgements

  • font "MinimalPixel" by @mounirtohami
